name: Cherry Design System
description:
Cherry is the foundation for your design system, from design to code. With examples of implementations in modern front-end technologies. Customizable and scalable, ready to be used out-of-the-box.


Clone this Figma file and use it as your starting point for your design system. Change what you need and scale gradually while maintaining consistency.


Cherry has its own Figma Plugin to generate design tokens automatically with a click of a button. Cherry Theme Generator exports all values of the design system. It supports PostCSS, Sass, and React Components.


To learn more about Cherry, check out the documentation at: https://cherry.design/
